name: Catnip (DJ990J)
description:
Get to the end of the level to collect the "Elusive Red Puzzle Piece" in order to get the "CatNip" at the end of the game. This is a short side scrolling runner game made with Game maker 8. 

This is my very first game I made for Game development class while in high school. This was made and completed in 2011.

Use the up, down and left arrow keys to move the player. The "R" key restarts the game and the "Esc" key ends the game.

Hello my name is Jasmine and I make games as a hobby.

Art-Stroke of Jasmine

Breeze Revolution graphics
